vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in Reentrancy_secure.withdrawBalance (patch_6.sol#7-20):
	External calls:
	- (success) = msg.sender.call.value(amountToWithdraw)() (patch_6.sol#14)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- locked (patch_6.sol#19)
	- userBalances (patch_6.sol#17)
